ARABIC: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No indeed! The book of the truly good is in 'llliyun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Surely the ledger of the pious will be in 'Illiyun (heights above the heights).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: No indeed! Verily, the deeds of the virtuous shall be in the record of the exalted ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, the records of the deeds of the virtuous ones will certainly be in Illiyin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the record of the virtuous is in the highest place, the Illiyin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! Verily, the Record of Al-Abrar (the righteous believers) is (preserved) in `Illiyyin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! Most surely the record of the righteous shall be in the Iliyin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No indeed; the book of the pious is in Illiyun;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but the record of the righteous is in 'Illiyin -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But, the record of the righteous is [preserved] in the 'Illiyyin --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By no means! Verily the record of the virtuous shall be in 'Illiyun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, the record of the pious is in Illeeyun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, verily the record of the Righteous is (preserved) in 'Illiyin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay! Verily, the Record (writing of the deeds) of Al-Abrar (the pious who fear Allah and avoid evil), is (preserved) in 'Illiyyun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But, the Book of the righteous is in the 'Illiyoon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: No indeed; the record of the righteous is in Elliyyeen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:18] Nay!, verily, the record of the pious, that is, the record of the deeds of the believers who were sincere in their faith, is in ‘Illiyyūn — this is said to be the book [containing] all the good deeds of the angels and the believers from among the two heavy ones [sc. mankind and jinn]; but it is also said to be a place below the Throne in the seventh heaven;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay) truly, Muhammad, (but the record of the righteous) the works of those who are true in their faith (is in 'Illiyyin
